com.lowagie.text.html

Class HtmlPeer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.xml.XmlPeer
      • com.lowagie.text.html.HtmlPeer

  • public class HtmlPeer
extends XmlPeer
    This interface is implemented by the peer of all the iText objects.
